headline.print_headline: Obama: US Offers Mexico Help on Missing Students
headline.main: Obama: US Offers Mexico Help on Missing Students

lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said Tuesday that the U.S. has offered to help Mexico figure out what happened to 43 college students who have been missing since September, but he stopped short of saying that aid to the U.S. ally and neighbor should be reconsidered on the basis of the country's human rights record.
